name: Gump
detailed_description:
Single/Co-op

Gump is now in both single and Co-op Player Mode. you would enjoy the silliness a bit more with a wingman joining in. enjoy the Custom Maps as many as as you want and Customise your Own gameplay.


About the Game

2D perspective Platformer. Arcade. its a retake on the classic Space shooter Arcade. 2.5D. it has Single And Co-op. two playing modes. Single/Co-op Player Linear Progression. Single/Co-op Player Custom Map Section. the linear Progression is a classical run through to the end level. where you fly unbounded forward. And it has open Custom Section Characters and Levels. its great if you want to just brush off the seriousness enjoy playing arcade space shooters. you can join in with your buddy and and finish the levels rather easily. once the custom mode opens you can choose your own enemies to dwell with and enjoy the 9 custom stages as many times as you want. the Maps are not redundant visually. if you don't like linear progression, you can enjoy the custom maps and make your own game. its not a option heavy game. nor very serious mission to save the world campaign as well. the arms presented and the Players, you'd find are a bit different than the usual trends. if you enjoy a game to fly in a 2.5d space and drop some bombs on the head you may enjoy the game. its about Doobie and his squandering miserably strange confrontation with the enemy of the third kind, the "GUMP". all characters and players are therefore a bit strange. ** please don't comment on game icons., breath in. let it go, and make bit of sound. then in all abolishment of the tormented little existance, try to think how hard it is to clean up the garbs.
about_the_game:
2D perspective Platformer. Arcade.
its a retake on the classic Space shooter Arcade. 2.5D. it has Single And Co-op.

two playing modes.
Single/Co-op Player Linear Progression.
Single/Co-op Player Custom Map Section.

the linear Progression is a classical run through to the end level. where you fly unbounded forward. And it has open Custom Section Characters and Levels.
its great if you want to just brush off the seriousness enjoy playing arcade space shooters. you can join in with your buddy and and finish the levels rather easily. once the custom mode opens you can choose your own enemies to dwell with and enjoy the 9 custom stages as many times as you want. the Maps are not redundant visually. if you don't like linear progression, you can enjoy the custom maps and make your own game.

its not a option heavy game. nor very serious mission to save the world campaign as well. the arms presented and the Players, you'd find are a bit different than the usual trends. if you enjoy a game to fly in a 2.5d space and drop some bombs on the head you may enjoy the game.

its about Doobie and his squandering miserably strange confrontation with the enemy of the third kind, the "GUMP". all characters and players are therefore a bit strange.
**
please don't comment on game icons., breath in. let it go, and make bit of sound. then in all abolishment of the tormented little existance, try to think how hard it is to clean up the garbs.
short_description: join Doobie and his bogus journey of Gump. the land is more bizarre and useless and so is he.

pc_requirements.minimum:
Minimum:
  • OS: Windows 7+
  • Processor: 2.2 GHz Intel Core i7
  • Memory: 2 GB RAM
  • Graphics: Intel Iris Pro 1536 MB
  • DirectX: Version 9.0
  • Storage: 2 GB available space
